attributes.action: Stop nurserys charging parents for days they are closed, eg Bank Holidays.
attributes.background: As a human right, we shouldn't have to pay for a service we are not getting. With the cost of living increasing and the average cost a day being £50+ to put your child into a nursery. Why are we paying for a service that can't physically be used when the nursery is closed. Stop bank holiday charges!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The pricing, and opening times, of privately provided childcare are matters for individual providers and parents, not the UK Government or Parliament.
